                        Coord king,

        king - The coordinate of the king

      • getPieceMoves

        public Move[] getPieceMoves(Coord pos,
                            int turn)
        Get the possible movements of a given piece
        Parameters:
        pos - a position on the board(should represent a piece and not an empty space)
        turn - who's turn it is.
        Returns:
        an array of Move objects that describe the movements available for that piece

                          int turn)

        Parameters:
        pos - a position on the board
        pieces - A list of coordinates where the pieces to be checked are
        turn - who's turn it is.
        Returns:
        an array of Coord objects that actually threaten pos

      • isThreatened

        public boolean isThreatened(Coord pos,
                            int turn)
        Check if a position is threatened
        Parameters:
        pos - a position on the board
        turn - who's turn it is.
        Returns:
        true or false, depending if another piece can move into that position or not.

      • isCheck

        public boolean isCheck(int turn)
        Check if the King is in Check on the current board.
        Returns:
        true or false, depending if the King for the current player is in check

      • isCheckMate

        public boolean isCheckMate()
        Check if the King is in Checkmate on the current board.
        Returns:
        true or false, depending if the King for the current player is in checkmate

      • isStalemate

        public boolean isStalemate()
        Check to see if the board is a stalemate
        Returns:
        true or false, depending if the King for the current player is in check

      • fromArray

        public void fromArray(int[][] b)
        Build a board from an array After this method is run, the Board associated will be the same as the array. The piece list will be built but the various flags will not be set. It is up to the programmer to set them.
        Parameters:
        b[][] - a board represented as an array of integers

        Parameters:
